front.title: IPv6 Stateless auto-configuration issues due to loss of IPv6 Router Solicitation messages

abstract.t: The IPv6 stateless auto-configuration(SLAAC) mechanism allows a hostto generate its own addresses using a combination of locallyavailable information and information advertised by routers. Thisdocument describes a failure scenario for SLAAC and discusses howhosts can recover from this failure in a properly configured network.
